LanguageData.hunter_Compound_bow.label: Compound bow
LanguageData.hunter_Compound_bow.description: It is a compound bow. It is a hunting bow mainly used by hunters, and shows higher performance than normal bows.
LanguageData.hunter_Compound_bow.tools.0.label: limb
LanguageData.Arrow_hunter_Compound.label: greatbow arrow
LanguageData.hunter_crow_bow.label: Crow bow
LanguageData.hunter_crow_bow.description: The Crow Bow is a mechanical crossbow. Although the range is lower than that of the compound bow, arrows can be fired in a volley and aim quickly.
LanguageData.hunter_crow_bow.tools.0.label: limb
LanguageData.Arrow_hunter_crow_bow.label: greatbow arrow
LanguageData.Moonlight_automatic_rifle.label: Moonlight assault submachine gun
LanguageData.Moonlight_automatic_rifle.description: It is a submachine gun with a near-futuristic design.\n\nA lighter weight firearm, it is designed to fire multiple rounds to keep the approaching enemy away.
LanguageData.Moonlight_automatic_rifle.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.Moonlight_automatic_rifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_automatic_rifle.label: automatic rifle bullet
LanguageData.Moonlight_assault_rifle.label: Moonlight assault rifle
LanguageData.Moonlight_assault_rifle.description: It is a composite rifle with enhanced assault rifles.\n\nIt has lower accuracy than assault rifles at long range, but has more ammo and high damage.
LanguageData.Moonlight_assault_rifle.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.Moonlight_assault_rifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Moonlight_assault_EMR.label: Moonlight marksman rifle
LanguageData.Moonlight_assault_EMR.description: This is a marksman rifle.\n\nIt has a shorter range than a sniper rifle, but has high accuracy and rate of fire.
LanguageData.Moonlight_assault_EMR.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.Moonlight_assault_EMR.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Moonlight_acceleration_MG.label: Moonlight accelerated machine gun
LanguageData.Moonlight_acceleration_MG.description: It's a moonlight accelerator machine gun.\n\nA lightweight weapon of the minigun, it fires quickly despite its low ammunition, and is intended for quick response.
LanguageData.Moonlight_acceleration_MG.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.Moonlight_acceleration_MG.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Moonlight_shotgun.label: Modified repeater shotgun
LanguageData.Moonlight_shotgun.description: This is a fast-firing assault shotgun.\n\nIncreased range and higher ammo than standard combat shotguns, but loses one shell.
LanguageData.Moonlight_shotgun.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.Moonlight_shotgun.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_assault_shotgun.label: shotgun bullet
LanguageData.Gun_Hunting_Rifle.label: hunter rifle
LanguageData.Gun_Hunting_Rifle.description: It is a hunting rifle used by Baekrang hunters. It has a scope and can easily hit long distances.
LanguageData.Gun_Hunting_Rifle.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.Gun_Hunting_Rifle.tools.1.label: barrel
